title: A Battle Scene
marks: Signature, Date and Label LR, in black: [PALAMEDES. STEVAERTS. / 1632]
description: battle scene with some soldiers on horseback with spears; soldier wearing armor, right of center on brown horse; fallen horse at right edge; fallen soldier beneath white horse, right of center; wounded soldier seated on ground, seen from back, in foreground; hat, gun and spear in foreground
